name: mcp-connect
description: Dead simple MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for exposing your app functions to AI agents

scripts.build: bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external @types/node && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.cjs --target node --format cjs --external @types/node
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/cli.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external @types/node
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run build && bun run build:cli

author: myat-kyaw-thu
